mapper.select: SELECT o.id,o.`count`,o.turnover_id,o.product_id,t.checkout,o.updated,o.created,p.product_num, t.discount, t.payment, p.taxgroup_id,t.table_id,p.category_id,p.num,p.product_price,p.thumb,m.NAME product_name,m2.NAME category_name FROM `order` o, turnover t, product p LEFT JOIN multilang m ON m.id = CONCAT('p', p.id) AND m.locale = #{locale}, category c LEFT JOIN multilang m2 ON m2.id = CONCAT('c', c.id) AND m2.locale = #{locale} WHERE o.turnover_id = #{turnover.id} AND o.turnover_id = t.id AND o.product_id = p.id AND c.id = p.category_id AND p.active = TRUE ORDER BY o.created

SELECT o.id, o.`count`, o.turnover_id, o.product_id, t.checkout, o.updated, o.created, p.product_num, p.taxgroup_id, t.table_id, p.category_id, p.num, p.product_price, p.thumb, m.NAME, t.discount, t.payment FROM `order` o, turnover t, product p LEFT JOIN multilang m ON m.id = CONCAT('p', p.id) AND m.locale = #{locale} WHERE o.turnover_id = #{turnover.id} AND o.turnover_id = t.id AND o.product_id = p.id AND p.active=true Order by o.created

SELECT o.id, o.`count`, o.turnover_id, o.product_id, o.updated, o.created, p.taxgroup_id, p.category_id, p.product_price, t.discount, t.checkout, t.takeaway_id, t.table_id, t.payment FROM `order` o, turnover t, product p WHERE o.turnover_id = t.id AND o.product_id = p.id AND o.created BETWEEN #{from} AND #{to}
